  1. The Service

    Sunrun provides homeowners an option to switch to solar energy. Homeowners can receive free quotes for home solar solutions. Sunrun partners with top PV panel installation companies to install solar systems. Sunrun monitors the performance of your system and provides full insurance and a money-back performance guarantee. Sunrun delivers an assortment of services through the customer website, including the ability for customers to pay their Sunrun bill and view the output of their solar power system.
